footer.description: The B2B platform connecting companies, clients, and contractors for your next construction project.

hero.title: The B2B Hub for Construction Projects
hero.subtitle: We connect companies, clients, and verified professionals in a transparent and efficient platform. From RFQ to project completion.

how_it_works.title: A Simplified Process for Everyone
how_it_works.subtitle: Our platform is designed to streamline the entire project lifecycle, ensuring transparency and efficiency for all parties involved.

steps.title: For Companies (Admin)
items: Create and publish detailed project RFQs.
Receive and evaluate proposals from contractors.
Score bids and award projects to the best fit.

steps.title: For Clients
items: Submit your project requirements with ease.
Track progress from start to finish.
Review shortlisted proposals for your project.

steps.title: For Contractors
items: Access a curated list of available projects.
Submit detailed technical and financial bids.
Manage your proposals and ongoing projects.
Build your reputation on the platform.

featured_projects.subtitle: Check out some of the latest opportunities available on our platform.
